C

CCompatibleInputStream - class borealis.client.CCompatibleInputStream.
The CCompatibleInputStream class provides Linux C compatible input streaming services.

Constructs a CCompatibleInputStream that reads from the specified InputStream.
CCompatibleOutputStream - class borealis.client.CCompatibleOutputStream.
The CCompatibleOutputStream class provides Linux C compatible output streaming services.

Constructs a CCompatibleOutputStream that writes to the specified OutputStream.
